description.english: Playing as Kislev, win the quest battle to free Boris Ursus.
description.german: Siegt als Kislev in der Aufgabenschlacht zur Befreiung von Boris Ursus.
description.french: Incarnez Kislev et gagnez la bataille de quête visant à libérer Boris Ursus.
description.italian: Giocando con Kislev, vinci la battaglia incarico per liberare Boris Ursus.
description.koreana: 키슬레프로 보리스 우르서스를 해방하는 퀘스트 전투에서 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Kislev y gana la batalla de aventura para liberar a Boris Ursus.
description.schinese: 扮演基斯里夫，打赢神器任务战斗并释放鲍里斯·厄孙
description.tchinese: 扮演基斯里夫，打贏任務戰鬥並釋放鮑里斯·厄索斯。
description.russian: Кислев: освободите Бориса Урсуса в особой битве.
description.polish: Grając jako Kislev, wygraj bitwę związaną z zadaniem uwolnienia Borysa Ursuna.
description.czech: Při hře za Kislev zvítěz v úkolové bitvě za osvobození Borise Ursa.
description.turkish: Kislev olarak oynarken Boris Ursus’u özgür bırakabilmek için görev muharebesini kazanın.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Kislev, vença uma batalha de busca para libertar Boris Ursus.

description.english: Play a multiplayer battle.
description.german: Bestreitet ein Mehrspielergefecht.
description.french: Faites une bataille en multijoueur.
description.italian: Gioca una battaglia multigiocatore.
description.koreana: 멀티 플레이 전투를 진행하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega una batalla multijugador.
description.schinese: 游玩一场多人战斗
description.tchinese: 進行一場多人戰鬥。
description.polish: Rozegraj bitwę w trybie wieloosobowym.
description.czech: Zahraj si bitvu pro více hráčů.
description.turkish: Çok oyunculu muharebe oyna.
description.brazilian: Jogue uma batalha multijogador.

description.english: Win a campaign battle in which you are outnumbered 10-to-1.
description.german: Gewinnt eine Kampagnenschlacht, in der Ihr 10 zu 1 in der Unterzahl seid.
description.french: Remportez une bataille de campagne durant laquelle l'ennemi est en surnombre à 10 contre 1.
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia della campagna in cui sei in inferiorità numerica 10 contro 1.
description.koreana: 10:1로 수적 열세인 캠페인 전투에서 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Gana una batalla de la campaña en la que tu enemigo te supere 10 a 1.
description.schinese: 在战力对比为10比1的劣势下打赢一场战役战斗
description.tchinese: 在10比1的兵力劣勢下打贏一場戰役戰鬥。
description.russian: Победите в кампании армию с перевесом 10-к-1.
description.polish: W trakcie kampanii wygraj bitwę z przeciwnikiem przewyższającym cię liczebnie 10 do 1.
description.czech: Vyhraj v kampani bitvu proti přesile 10 ku 1.
description.turkish: Rakibinin sayıca 10 kat üstün olduğu bir sefer muharebesini kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha em campanha na qual você esteja com desvantagem numérica de 10 para 1.

description.english: Fight a quest battle.
description.german: Bestreitet eine Aufgabenschlacht.
description.french: Faites une bataille de quête.
description.italian: Combatti una Battaglia Incarico.
description.koreana: 퀘스트 전투를 치르십시오.
description.spanish: Libra una batalla de aventura.
description.schinese: 进行一场神器任务战斗
description.tchinese: 進行一場神器任務戰鬥。
description.polish: Stocz bitwę związaną z zadaniem.
description.czech: Vybojuj úkolovou bitvu.
description.turkish: Bir görev muharebesinde çatış.
description.brazilian: Trave uma batalha de busca.

description.english: Win 10 battles during a single campaign.
description.german: Gewinnt 10 Gefechte in einer einzigen Kampagne.

description.koreana: 싱글 캠페인에서 전투를 10회 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Gana 10 batallas durante una sola campaña.
description.schinese: 在一场战役中打赢10场战斗
description.tchinese: 在單場戰役中打贏10場戰鬥。
description.russian: Выиграйте 10 битв на протяжении одной кампании.
description.polish: Wygraj 10 bitew podczas jednej kampanii.
description.czech: Vyhraj v průběhu jediné kampaně 10 bitev.
description.turkish: Tek bir sefer esnasında  10 pusu muharebesi kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença 10 batalhas em uma única campanha.

description.french: Remportez 25 batailles d'attaque de siège lors d'une seule et même campagne.
description.italian: Vinci 25 battaglie d'assedio in attacco durante una campagna.

description.schinese: 在一场战役中打赢25场攻城战
description.tchinese: 在單場戰役中打贏25場圍城戰。
description.russian: Выиграйте 25 осад в роли атакующего за одну кампанию.
description.polish: W trakcie jednej kampanii wygraj w 25 oblężeniach jako atakujący.
description.czech: Vyhraj v průběhu jediné kampaně 25 obléhacích bitev jako útočník.
description.turkish: Tek bir sefer esnasında 25 kuşatma saldırısı muharebesi kazanın.
description.brazilian: Vença 25 batalhas de cerco em uma única campanha, como agressor.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, complete a Caravan's journey.
description.german: Beendet als Cathay eine Karawanenreise.
description.french: Incarnez Cathay et terminez un périple de caravane.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, porta a termine un viaggio della Carovana.
description.koreana: 케세이로 플레이하면서 대상단의 여정을 1회 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Catai y completa un viaje de caravana.
description.schinese: 扮演震旦，完成一次商队旅程
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，完成商隊之旅。
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, ukończ podróż karawany.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj dokonči cestu karavany.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken bir Kervan yolculuğu tamamlayın.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, conclua uma jornada de Caravana.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, construct the Grand Observatory of Xing Po.
description.german: Errichtet als Cathay das Große Observatorium von Xing Po.
description.french: Incarnez Cathay et construisez le Grand Observatoire de Xing Po.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, costruisci il Grande Osservatorio di Xing Po.
description.koreana: 케세이로 플레이하면서 성포 대천문대를 건설하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Catai y construye el Gran Observatorio de Xing Po.
description.schinese: 扮演震旦，建造兴坡钦天监
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，建造興波大觀星台。
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, zbuduj Wielkie Obserwatorium Xing Po.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj postav Velkou observatoř v Xing Po.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken Xing Po’nun Büyük Gözlemevi’ni inşa edin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, construa o Grande Observatório de Xing Po.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, occupy the entirety of the Great Bastion.
description.german: Besetzt als Cathay die gesamte Große Bastion.
description.french: Incarnez Cathay et occupez le Grand Bastion dans son intégralité.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, occupa l'intero Grande Bastione.

description.schinese: 扮演震旦，完全占领长垣
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，佔領整座長城。
description.russian: Катай: займите всю Великую твердыню целиком.
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, zajmij Wielki Bastion w całości.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj ovládni celou Velkou pevnost.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken Büyük Burç’un tamamını işgal edin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, ocupe todo o Grande Bastião.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, occupy Wei-Jin.

description.french: Incarnez Cathay et occupez Wei-Jin.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, occupa Weijin.
description.koreana: 케세이로 플레이하면서 위진을 점령하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Catai y ocupa Wei-Jin.
description.schinese: 扮演震旦，占领巍京
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，佔領魏京。
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, zajmij Wei-Jin.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj ovládni Wei-Jin.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken Wei-Jin’i işgal edin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, ocupe Wei-Jin.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, recruit a Terracotta Sentinel to one of your armies.
description.german: Rekrutiert als Cathay eine Terrakottawache in eine Eurer Armeen.
description.french: Incarnez Cathay et recrutez une Sentinelle de Terre cuite dans l'une de vos armées.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, recluta una Sentinella di Terracotta in uno dei tuoi eserciti.
description.koreana: 케세이로 플레이하면서 도자초병 하나를 아군으로 모집하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Catai y recluta a un Centinela de Terracota en uno de tus ejércitos.
description.schinese: 扮演震旦，为军队招募一位俑士禁卫
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，招募兵馬俑衛士至您其中一支軍隊。
description.russian: Катай: наймите терракотового стража в армию.
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, zwerbuj Terakotowego Strażnika do jednej ze swoich armii.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj naverbuj do jednoho ze svých vojsk terakotového strážce.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken ordularınızdan birine Terakota Gözcüsü yetiştirin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, recrute um Sentinela de Terracota para um de seus exércitos.

description.english: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Brass Citadel in the realm of Khorne.
description.german: Besiegt den Dämonenprinzen bei der Messingzitadelle im Reich des Khorne.
description.french: Éliminez le Prince Démon dans la Citadelle d'Airain situé dans le royaume de Khorne.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Principe Demone alla Cittadella d'Ottone nel regno di Khorne.
description.koreana: 코른의 영역에서 황동 성채에 있는 악마 대공을 물리치십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Príncipe Demonio en la Ciudadela de Bronce del reino de Khorne.
description.schinese: 在恐虐魔域的黄铜魔堡击败恶魔亲王
description.tchinese: 擊敗恐虐國度黃銅城堡的惡魔王子。
description.polish: Pokonaj Demonicznego Księcia pod Miedzianą Cytadelą w krainie Khorne’a.
description.czech: Poraz Prince démonů v Mosazné citadele v Khornově říši.
description.turkish: Khorne’in diyarındaki Pirinç Hisarı’nda bulunan İblis Prensi’ni mağlup edin.
description.brazilian: Derrote um Príncipe Demônio na Fortaleza de Bronze do reino de Khorne.

description.english: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Mansion of the Plaguelord in the realm of Nurgle.
description.german: Besiegt den Dämonenprinzen beim Herrenhaus des Seuchenherrschers im Reich des Nurgle.
description.french: Éliminez le Prince Démon dans le Manoir du Seigneur de la Peste situé dans le royaume de Nurgle.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Principe Demone alla Magione del Signore della Peste nel regno di Nurgle.
description.koreana: 너글의 영역에서 역병 군주의 저택에 있는 악마 대공을 물리치십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Príncipe Demonio en la Mansión del Señor de la Plaga del reino de Nurgle.
description.schinese: 在纳垢魔域的瘟神府邸击败恶魔亲王
description.tchinese: 擊敗納垢國度瘟疫之主宅邸的惡魔王子。
description.russian: Победите принца-демона в особняке Властителя Чумы.
description.polish: Pokonaj Demonicznego Księcia pod Posiadłością Pana Zarazy w krainie Nurgle’a.
description.czech: Poraz Prince démonů v sídle Morového pána v Nurglově říši.
description.turkish: Nurgle’in diyarındaki Veba Lordu’nun Malikanesi’nde bulunan İblis Prensi’ni mağlup edin.
description.brazilian: Derrote um Príncipe Demônio na Mansão do Senhor da Peste do reino de Nurgle.

description.english: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Palace of Slaanesh in the realm of Slaanesh.
description.german: Besiegt den Dämonenprinzen beim Palast des Slaanesh im Reich des Slaanesh.
description.french: Éliminez le Prince Démon dans le Palais de Slaanesh situé dans le royaume de Slaanesh.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Principe Demone al Palazzo di Slaanesh nel regno di Slaanesh.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬의 영역 내 슬라네쉬의 궁전에 있는 악마 대공을 물리치십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Príncipe Demonio en el Palacio de Slaanesh del reino de Slaanesh.
description.schinese: 在色孽魔域的色孽宫殿击败恶魔亲王
description.tchinese: 擊敗色孽國度色孽宮殿的惡魔王子。

description.czech: Poraz Prince démonů ve Slaaneshově paláci ve Slaaneshově říši.
description.turkish: Slaanesh’in diyarındaki Slaanesh’in Sarayı’nda bulunan İblis Prensi’ni mağlup edin.
description.brazilian: Derrote um Príncipe Demônio no Palácio de Slaanesh do reino de Slaanesh.

description.english: Defeat the Daemon Prince at the Impossible Fortress in the realm of Tzeentch.
description.german: Besiegt den Dämonenprinzen bei der Unmöglichen Festung im Reich des Tzeentch.
description.french: Éliminez le Prince Démon dans la Forteresse Impossible située dans le royaume de Tzeentch.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Principe Demone alla Fortezza Impossibile nel regno di Tzeentch.
description.koreana: 젠취의 영역에서 불가능의 요새에 있는 악마 대공을 물리치십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Príncipe Demonio en la Fortaleza Imposible del reino de Tzeentch.
description.schinese: 在奸奇魔域的玄妙妖垒击败恶魔亲王
description.tchinese: 擊敗奸奇國度無解要塞的惡魔王子。
description.polish: Pokonaj Demonicznego Księcia pod Niemożliwą Fortecą w krainie Tzeentcha.
description.czech: Poraz Prince démonů v Nemožné pevnosti v Tzeentchově říši.
description.turkish: Tzeentch’in diyarındaki İmkânsız Hisar’da bulunan İblis Prensi’ni mağlup edin.
description.brazilian: Derrote um Príncipe Demônio na Fortaleza Impossível do reino de Tzeentch.

description.english: Raze 1 settlement.
description.german: Reißt 1 Siedlung nieder.
description.french: Rasez 1 colonie.
description.italian: Radi al suolo un insediamento.
description.koreana: 정착지 1곳을 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: Arrasa 1 asentamiento.
description.schinese: 毁灭1座城镇
description.tchinese: 摧毀1個城鎮。

description.czech: Srovnej se zemí 1 sídlo.
description.turkish: 1 yerleşim yerini yerle bir edin.
description.brazilian: Devaste 1 povoado.

description.english: Raze 30 settlements during a single campaign.
description.german: Reißt 30 Siedlungen in einer einzigen Kampagne nieder.

description.italian: Radi al suolo 30 insediamenti nel corso di una singola campagna.

description.schinese: 在一场战役中毁灭30座城镇

description.english: Construct an allied outpost in a military ally's settlement.

description.english: Playing as the Daemon Prince, ascend to a Chaos God's path.

description.english: Playing as the Daemon Prince, ascend to the Undivided path.

description.czech: Při hře za Prince démonů se dostaň na stezku jednoty.

description.brazilian: Jogando com o Príncipe Demônio, ascenda ao caminho Indiviso.

description.czech: Během prologu přidej Yurimu do výbavy všechny druhy magických předmětů.
description.turkish: Giriş bölümü süresince Yuri’yi her tür büyülü eşya ile donatın.
description.brazilian: Durante o Prólogo, equipe Yuri com todos os tipos de itens mágicos.

description.english: During the Prologue, recruit a second Lord.
description.german: Rekrutiert im Prolog einen zweiten Kommandanten.
description.french: Lors du prologue, recrutez un deuxième Seigneur.
description.italian: Recluta un secondo Lord durante il Prologo.
description.koreana: 프롤로그를 진행하면서 두 번째 군주를 모집하십시오.
description.spanish: Recluta un segundo Señor durante el prólogo.
description.schinese: 在序章战役中，招募第二位领主
description.tchinese: 在序章期間，招募第二個領主。
description.polish: Podczas prologu zwerbuj drugiego lorda.
description.czech: Během prologu naverbuj druhého šlechtice.
description.turkish: Giriş bölümü süresince ikinci bir Lord yetiştirin.
description.brazilian: Durante o Prólogo, recrute um segundo Senhor.

description.english: During the Prologue, capture a settlement in the Chaos Wastes.
description.german: Nehmt im Prolog eine Siedlung in der Chaoswüste ein.
description.french: Lors du prologue, capturez une colonie dans les Désolations du Chaos.
description.italian: Conquista un insediamento nelle Desolazioni del Caos durante il Prologo.
description.koreana: 프롤로그를 진행하면서 카오스 황무지의 정착지를 하나 점령하십시오.
description.spanish: Captura un asentamiento en los Desiertos del Caos durante el prólogo.
description.schinese: 在序章战役中，在混沌荒原占领一座城镇
description.tchinese: 在序章期間，佔領混沌荒原的一座城鎮。
description.russian: Пролог: захватите поселение в Пустошах Хаоса.
description.polish: Podczas prologu zajmij osadę na Pustkowiach Chaosu.
description.czech: Během prologu zaber sídlo v Pustinách Chaosu.
description.turkish: Giriş bölümü süresince Kaos Çorakları topraklarında bir yerleşim yeri ele geçirin.
description.brazilian: Durante o Prólogo, capture um povoado nos Desertos do Caos.

description.english: During the Prologue, fully upgrade a settlement.
description.german: Verbessert im Prolog eine Siedlung so weit wie möglich.
description.french: Lors du prologue, améliorez entièrement une colonie.
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo un insediamento durante il Prologo.
description.koreana: 프롤로그를 진행하면서 정착지 하나를 끝까지 승급하십시오.
description.spanish: Mejora por completo un asentamiento durante el prólogo.
description.schinese: 在序章战役中，完全升级一座城镇
description.tchinese: 在序章期間，完全升級一座城鎮。
description.polish: Podczas prologu w pełni ulepsz osadę.
description.czech: Během prologu plně vylepši jedno sídlo.
description.turkish: Giriş bölümü süresince bir yerleşim yerini tamamen yükseltin.
description.brazilian: Durante o Prólogo, melhore completamente um povoado.

description.english: During the Prologue, spend 10 skill points.
description.german: Gebt im Prolog 10 Fähigkeitenpunkte aus.
description.french: Lors du prologue, dépensez 10 points de compétence.
description.italian: Spendi 10 punti abilità durante il Prologo.
description.koreana: 프롤로그를 진행하면서 스킬 점수를 10 소비하십시오.
description.spanish: Gasta 10 puntos de habilidad durante el prólogo.
description.schinese: 在序章战役中，花费10个技能点
description.tchinese: 在序章期間，花費10個技能點數。
description.polish: Podczas prologu wydaj 10 punktów umiejętności.
description.czech: Během prologu utrať 10 bodů schopností.
description.turkish: Giriş bölümü süresince 10 yetenek puanı harcayın.
description.brazilian: Durante o Prólogo, gaste 10 pontos de habilidade.

description.english: Playing as Slaanesh, construct the Pandemournium.
description.german: Errichtet als Slaanesh das Pandämonium.
description.french: Incarnez Slaanesh et construisez le Pandéminium.
description.italian: Giocando con Slaanesh, costruisci il Pandemournium.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬로 플레이하면서 쾌락의 만마전을 건설하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Slaanesh y construye el Pangemionio.
description.schinese: 扮演色孽，建造喧嚣剧院
description.tchinese: 扮演色孽，建造悲悼劇院。
description.polish: Grając jako Slaanesh, zbuduj Pandemorium.
description.czech: Při hře za Slaaneshe postav truchlipeklo.
description.turkish: Slaneesh olarak oynarken Pandemournium inşa edin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Slaanesh, construa a Pandemópera.

description.english: Playing as Slaanesh, recruit a Keeper of Secrets to one of your armies.
description.german: Rekrutiert als Slaanesh einen Hüter der Geheimnisse in eine Eurer Armeen.
description.french: Incarnez Slaanesh et recrutez un Gardien des Secrets dans l'une de vos armées.
description.italian: Giocando con Slaanesh, recluta un Custode dei Segreti in uno dei tuoi eserciti.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬로 플레이하면서 비밀의 수호자 하나를 아군으로 모집하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Slaanesh y recluta a un Guardián de Secretos en uno de tus ejércitos.
description.schinese: 扮演色孽，为军队招募一名守密者
description.tchinese: 扮演色孽，招募守密者至您其中一支軍隊。
description.russian: Слаанеш: наймите хранителя секретов в свою армию.
description.polish: Grając jako Slaanesh, zwerbuj Powiernika Tajemnic do jednej ze swoich armii.
description.czech: Při hře za Slaaneshe naverbuj do jednoho ze svých vojsk strážce tajemství.
description.turkish: Slaneesh olarak oynarken ordularınızdan birisine Sırların Muhafızı yetiştirin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Slaanesh, recrute um Guardião dos Segredos para um de seus exércitos.

description.english: Playing as Slaanesh, replace a Herald of Slaanesh with an Exalted Keeper of Secrets.
description.german: Ersetzt als Slaanesh einen Herold des Slaanesh mit einem Erhabenen Hüter der Geheimnisse.
description.french: Incarnez Slaanesh et remplacez un Héraut de Slaanesh par un Gardien des Secrets Exalté.
description.italian: Giocando con Slaanesh, sostituisci un Araldo di Slaanesh con un Custode dei Segreti Esaltato.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬로 플레이하면서 사도를 고위 비밀의 수호자로 교체하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Slaanesh y sustituye a un Heraldo de Slaanesh por un Glorioso Guardián de Secretos.
description.schinese: 扮演色孽，将色孽军锋替换为神尊守密者
description.tchinese: 扮演色孽，將一名色孽先驅替換成一名高階守密者。
description.russian: Слаанеш: замените герольда возвышенным хранителем секретов.
description.polish: Grając jako Slaanesh, zastąp Herolda Slaanesha Wzniosłym Powiernikiem Tajemnic.
description.czech: Při hře za Slaaneshe nahraď postavu Slaaneshova zvěstovatele vznešeným strážcem tajemství.
description.turkish: Slaanesh olarak oynarken bir Slaanesh Müjdecisini Sırların Lordu ile değiştirin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Slaanesh, substitua uma Arauta de Slaanesh por um Guardião dos Segredos Glorificado.

description.english: Playing as Slaanesh, spread a Gift of Slaanesh.
description.german: Verbreitet als Slaanesh eine Gabe des Slaanesh.
description.french: Incarnez Slaanesh et octroyez un Don de Slaanesh.
description.italian: Giocando con Slaanesh, spargi un Dono di Slaanesh.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬로 플레이하면서 슬라네쉬의 선물을 내리십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Slaanesh y otorga un Obsequio de Slaanesh.
description.schinese: 扮演色孽，传播一项色孽之礼
description.tchinese: 扮演色孽，散播色孽之禮。
description.polish: Grając jako Slaanesh, rozprzestrzeniaj Dar Slaanesha.
description.czech: Při hře za Slaaneshe předej Slaaneshův dar.
description.turkish: Slaanesh olarak oynarken bir Slaanesh'in Armağanı yayın.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Slaanesh, espalhe uma Dádiva de Slaanesh.

description.english: Playing as Slaanesh, summon a Disciple Army.
description.german: Beschwört als Slaanesh eine Armee der Getreuen.
description.french: Incarnez Slaanesh et convoquez une armée de disciples.
description.italian: Giocando con Slaanesh, evoca un Esercito di discepoli.
description.koreana: 슬라네쉬로 플레이하면서 사도 군단을 하나 소환하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Slaanesh e invoca a un ejército de discípulos.
description.schinese: 扮演色孽，召唤一支信徒军队
description.tchinese: 扮演色孽，召喚一支追隨者軍隊。
description.polish: Grając jako Slaanesh, przyzwij armię wyznawców.
description.czech: Při hře za Slaaneshe přivolej armádu stoupenců.
description.turkish: Slaanesh olarak oynarken bir Mürit Ordusu çağırın.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Slaanesh, invoque um Exército de Discípulos.

description.english: Playing as Tzeentch, construct the Symposium of Change.
description.german: Errichtet als Tzeentch das Symposium des Wandels.
description.french: Incarnez Tzeentch et construisez le Symposium du Changement.
description.italian: Giocando con Tzeentch, costruisci il Simposio del Mutamento.
description.koreana: 젠취로 플레이하면서 변화의 토론회를 건설하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Tzeentch y construye el Simposio del Cambio.
description.schinese: 扮演奸奇，建造万变宴会
description.tchinese: 扮演奸奇，建造萬變論壇。
description.polish: Grając jako Tzeentch, zbuduj Sympozjum Przemian.
description.czech: Při hře za Tzeentche postav Sympozium změny.
description.turkish: Tzeentch olarak oynarken bir Değişim Sempozyumu inşa edin.
description.brazilian: Jogando como Tzeentch, construa o Simpósio da Transformação.

description.english: Playing as Tzeentch, replace a Herald of Tzeentch with an Exalted Lord of Change.
description.german: Ersetzt als Tzeentch einen Herold des Tzeentch mit einem Erhabenen Herrscher des Wandels.
description.french: Incarnez Tzeentch et remplacez un Héraut de Tzeentch par un Duc du Changement Exalté.
description.italian: Giocando con Tzeentch, sostituisci un Araldo di Tzeentch con un Signore del Mutamento Esaltato.
description.koreana: 젠취로 플레이하면서 젠취의 사도를 고위 변화의 군주로 교체하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega con Tzeentch y sustituye un Heraldo de Tzeentch por un Glorioso Señor de la Transformación.
description.schinese: 扮演奸奇，将奸奇军锋替换为神尊万变魔君
description.tchinese: 扮演奸奇，將一名奸奇先驅替換成一名高階萬變領主。
description.russian: Тзинч: замените герольда возвышенным властителем перемен.
description.polish: Grając jako Tzeentch, zastąp Herolda Tzeentcha Wzniosłym Panem Przemian.
description.czech: Při hře za Tzeentche nahraď postavu Tzeentchova zvěstovatele vznešeným pánem proměn.
description.turkish: Tzeentch olarak oynarken bir Tzeentch Müjdecisini Yüce Değişim Lordu ile değiştirin.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Tzeentch, substitua um Arauto de Tzeentch por um Senhor da Transformação Glorificado.

description.english: Playing as Tzeentch, unlock all Changing of the Ways actions.
description.german: Schaltet als Tzeentch alle Aktionen der Wandlung der Wege frei.
description.french: Incarnez Tzeentch et déverrouillez toutes les actions de Changement des Us.
description.italian: Giocando con Tzeentch, sblocca tutte le azioni di Manipolazione dei destini.
description.koreana: 젠취로 플레이하면서 섭리의 변화를 전부 해금하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Tzeentch y desbloquea todas las acciones de Transformación de las cosas.
description.schinese: 扮演奸奇，解锁所有万变之道行动
description.tchinese: 扮演奸奇，解除所有萬變之道行動的鎖定。
description.russian: Тзинч: откройте доступ ко всем Великим перенам.
description.polish: Grając jako Tzeentch, odblokuj wszystkie działania splątania ścieżek.
description.czech: Při hře za Tzeentche odemkni všechny akce změn poměrů.
description.turkish: Tzeentch olarak oynarken tüm Yöntemleri Değiştirme eylemlerini açın.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Tzeentch, desbloqueie todas as ações de Transformação das Coisas.

description.english: Playing as Cathay, win a singleplayer campaign.
description.german: Gewinnt als Cathay eine Einzelspielerkampagne.
description.french: Incarnez Cathay et remportez une campagne à un joueur.
description.italian: Giocando con il Catai, vinci una campagna per giocatore singolo.
description.koreana: 케세이로 싱글 플레이 캠페인을 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Juega como Catai y gana la campaña para un jugador.
description.schinese: 扮演震旦，打赢一场单人战役
description.tchinese: 扮演震旦，贏得一場單人戰役。
description.polish: Grając jako Kataj, przejdź kampanię jednoosobową.
description.czech: Při hře za Kataj vyhraj kampaň pro jednoho hráče.
description.turkish: Cathay olarak oynarken, bir tek oyunculu sefer kazan.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Cathay, vença uma campanha solo.

description.turkish: İblis Prensi olarak oynarken bir tek oyunculu sefer kazan.

description.german: Gewinnt als Dämonenprinz eine Einzelspielerkampagne auf „Sehr schwer“ oder „Legendär“.
description.french: Incarnez le Prince Démon et remportez une campagne à un joueur en Très difficile ou Légendaire.
description.italian: Vinci una campagna per giocatore singolo in Molto difficile o Leggendaria con Principe Demone.
description.koreana: 악마 대공으로 매우 어려움/전설 난이도 싱글 캠페인을 승리하십시오.
